Package com.project

Class ExcelReader

java.lang.Object
com.project.ExcelReader
public class ExcelReader extends Object
Utility class for reading Excel files and converting rows into domain-specific Java objects such as Project, Applicant, Manager, Officer, and Inquiry.

Uses Apache POI for parsing `.xlsx` files.

    • readProjects

      public List<Project> readProjects(String filePath) throws IOException
      Reads project data from an Excel file and constructs a list of Project objects.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the Excel file
      Returns:
      a list of Project instances
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading the file

    • readInquiries

      public List<Inquiry> readInquiries(String filePath, List<Applicant> applicants) throws IOException
      Reads inquiries from an Excel file and maps them to existing Applicant objects by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the Excel file
      applicants - list of Applicants for NRIC matching
      Returns:
      a list of Inquiry objects associated with applicants
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading the file

    • readApplicantStatusList

      public void readApplicantStatusList(String filename, List<Applicant> applicantList, List<Project> projectList) throws IOException
      Updates a list of Applicant objects with their application status details from an Excel file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the path to the Excel file
      applicantList - the list of applicants to update
      projectList - the list of available projects for matching applied project names
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read

    • readOfficerStatusList

      public void readOfficerStatusList(String filename, List<Officer> officerList, List<Project> projectList) throws IOException
      Updates a list of Officer objects with their application and registration status details from an Excel file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the path to the Excel file
      officerList - the list of officers to update
      projectList - the list of projects used for matching officer applications and registrations
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read
